name: attendee-payment-Incomplete
subject: Your registration for [[event.display_name]]
body:
Greetings,

It looks like you may have forgotten your badge for **[[event.display_name]]**. Your [[badge_type_name]] registration for **[[display_name]]** is waiting for you.


You can resume your shopping here: [My Cart]([[cart_url]])

Thanks again,
[[event-name]] Registration
